attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become virtually impossible to live in the UK with the taxes imposed upon us and products. Taxes continue to rise and Not in-line with wage increases. NI TAX, Council Tax, Car Tax are just some that need to be decreased in order to make it easier to live. Please!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
